Title: QualityHelper
Description: QualityHelper is a silverlight based documentation tool that helps enterprises keep document versions up to date and associates documents with procedures and processes in your enterprises. It is an essential tool for a large enterprise with a quality management system.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
QualityHelper is a silverlight based documentation tool that helps enterprises keep document versions up to date and associates documents with procedures and processes in your enterprises. It is an essential tool for a large enterprise with a quality management system.

QualityHelper uses Silverlight & Google Gears.

For the service component go to QualityHelperService @ http://www.codeplex.com/qhs .

For more information:
Go to: http://foundin.com.au/Default.aspx?Tabid=213

For a demo:
Go to: http://foundin.com.au/qhdemo

The product is in alpha. It is expected to be release quality by end of January.

An example of the running application will be posted in the next few days.
